alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 10:39AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lower Keys in Monroe County through 1115 AM EDT... At 1038 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Geiger Key, or over Big Coppitt Key, moving west at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Key West, Big Coppitt Key, Boca Chica Channel Bridge, Boca Chica, Fleming Key, Key Haven, Saddlebunch Keys, Geiger Key, Bay Point and Shark Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 3 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
